<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Investment  request">cd2bced097d571102d7ebf56f053af85</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CheckValue</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below


    var InvestValue = g_form.getValue('investionsbetrag');
	
    if (Number(InvestValue) < 800) {
        //alert('Der Betrag muss größer als 800 Euro sein.');
        g_form.addErrorMessage('Der Investionsbetrag muss größer als 800 Euro sein.');
        g_form.setValue('investionsbetrag', '');
        return false;
    }



}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-11 16:44:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3f40929897d571102d7ebf56f053af9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckValue</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Fuchsclan Test" source="x_557984_fuchsclan">57227043974131102d7ebf56f053afdd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Fuchsclan Test">57227043974131102d7ebf56f053afdd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3f40929897d571102d7ebf56f053af9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-12 06:35:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
